Text:
thanks for downloading everyone!

check out my new album here:

http://thriftstoretalent.bandcamp.com
No individual tracks, but still awesome. Split-tracks OST is out there somewhere.

@ YMGenesis:

i've looked, and i'm the first to upload the soundtrack. i'm sure someone will find the time to clip each track and reupload, but i don't have the time to do all that.

Ya totally, no hate here.

You can get the soundtrack with split tracks from warez-bb.com. Gotta make an account first.

@ YMGenesis: 

i gotcha. thx for the link. and for taking the time to comment and for feedback. ;) if i had a ship, i'd hire you.
